fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.javamail

Class JMMailBoxFolder

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.core.MailBoxFolder
      • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.javamail.JMMailBoxFolder

  • public class JMMailBoxFolder
extends MailBoxFolder
    MailBoxFolder sub-class for mail boxes extracted through JavaMail library.

    For now, IMAP and Thunderbird mbox structure through MailExtract application, could also be used for POP3 and Gmail, via StoreExtractor (not tested).

    • Field Summary

      • createRootFolder

        public static JMMailBoxFolder createRootFolder(StoreExtractor storeExtractor,
                                               javax.mail.Folder folder,
                                               ArchiveUnit rootArchiveUnit)
        Creates the root folder from which all extraction or listing is done.
        Parameters:
        storeExtractor - Operation store extractor
        folder - Root native JavaMail folder
        rootArchiveUnit - Root ArchiveUnit
        Returns:
        the JM mail box folder

      • doExtractFolderMessages

        protected void doExtractFolderMessages()
                                throws ExtractionException
        Description copied from class: MailBoxFolder
        Extract folder messages (protocol specific).

        It extracts folder messages, count these messages with incFolderMessagesCount, and accumulate their raw size with addFolderMessagesRawSize.

        Specified by:
        doExtractFolderMessages in class MailBoxFolder
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • doExtractSubFolders

        protected void doExtractSubFolders(int level)
                            throws ExtractionException
        Description copied from class: MailBoxFolder
        Extract subfolders (protocol specific).

        It recursively call extractFolder and count extracted sub folders with incFolderSubFoldersCount. Must implement drop options.

        Specified by:
        doExtractSubFolders in class MailBoxFolder
        Parameters:
        level - distance from the root folder (used for drop options)
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • getFullName

        public String getFullName()
        Description copied from class: MailBoxFolder
        Gets the full name.

        It depends on the inner representation of folder in subclasses, so abstract.

        Specified by:
        getFullName in class MailBoxFolder
        Returns:
        the full name, is empty if operation root folder

      • doListFolderMessages

        protected void doListFolderMessages()
                             throws ExtractionException
        Description copied from class: MailBoxFolder
        List folder messages (protocol specific).

        If stats where asked for, this method is invoked for counting messages with incFolderMessagesCount, and accumulating raw size with addFolderMessagesRawSize.

        Specified by:
        doListFolderMessages in class MailBoxFolder
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • doListSubFolders

        protected void doListSubFolders(boolean stats)
                         throws ExtractionException
        Description copied from class: MailBoxFolder
        List subfolders (protocol specific).

        It recursively call listFolder and count sub folders with incFolderSubFoldersCount.

        Specified by:
        doListSubFolders in class MailBoxFolder
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)
